meanings.definition: A type of photographic film that is sensitive to all colors of light.
meanings.sent1: The photographer chose panchromatic film to capture the true essence of the landscape.
meanings.sent2: The panchromatic film produced stunning photographs with rich, lifelike colors.
meanings.sent3: The detective used panchromatic film to uncover hidden details in the crime scene.
meanings.sent4: The panchromatic film revealed a world of colors invisible to the naked eye.
meanings.sent5: The artist preferred panchromatic film for its ability to faithfully reproduce the full spectrum of colors.
